info.name: Firefox 4 Windows 7 total remake (design an glass)
info.description:
A total remake of Firefox 4 just try it before install
tested on firefox 4 and 4.0.1 and 5.0 and 6.0a and 7.1
Need restart for some glass efect!
Features :
Glass and drag all sigle part of firefox
Remake of dialog and textbox

see also Informational tab Tumbail ! in the related skin on the left!
